name: C.L.O.V.E.R.
description:
Can you find all the artifacts?

A small game created during an in-house game jam.  Best experienced with audio. Designed to be played in one sitting.  

Disclaimer: possible bugs and glitches are features and totally planned.

Thank you for playing! We hope you have fun with our little game!

- FoxFail Creations

Controls: 

Keyboard and mouse required

W,A,S,D - Move

Left Shift - Accelerate

Space - Brake

F - Call out

E - Interact
